title: Dae file takes too much time to load

content.raw:
Hi, I am trying to load the model of big datawarehouse for further creation of world, but it is taking too much time to load in gazebo and is not loading properly , it is not performing any function . The .dae file is of 1.1 MB only. Can anyone suggest how to speed up the process ?

I am using gazebo-3.0 version. I have also tried with gazebo version 4.0, but still it is very slow.
content.html:
Hi, I am trying to load the model of big datawarehouse for further creation of world, but it is taking too much time to load in gazebo and is not loading properly , it is not performing any function . The .dae file is of 1.1 MB only. Can anyone suggest how to speed up the process ?

I am using gazebo-3.0 version. I have also tried with gazebo version 4.0, but still it is very slow.
